info.name: Howard Sofa 3 Seater
info.description: A timeless country house design, the Howard is one of the UK's bestselling models. This classic sofa has a softly curved sprung back, low arms and a deep seat. The seat cushions are packed with feather and down for optimum comfort and luxury. Armchairs, footstools and 12 combinations of corner unit are available to complement this piece.
